title: Book a Guaranteed Delivery Service
description: A critical shipment must arrive by a specific time. The planner must book a guaranteed service with an LTL carrier.

tasks.description: When getting LTL rates, specify a 'Guaranteed by 10 AM' service requirement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rating request includes the special service flag.

tasks.description: The system returns rates only from carriers that offer this guaranteed service, along with the service upcharge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Only relevant carriers and services are displayed.

tasks.description: Select a carrier and book the shipment, ensuring the 'Guaranteed Service' option is selected.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shipment is booked with the carrier, and the guarantee is noted on the BOL.
